data.speaker: Player
data.content: I... What have I done? I hope I made the right choice...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: A loud cackle resonates through my head... It's... the last surviving painting...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (OH MAN! I can't believe you let me live!! I must thank you!)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (For the record, that last guy you slaughtered? He was one of the last genuinely good people I ever knew.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (Isn't it nice to know you permanently removed some of the good in the world and made it a worse place?)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (Anyways, you're free to go... I have people waiting for me... in my basement...)
There's the door! I guess you did know where to look!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Did you not hear... the voices?
